Text: Gather and Share from Dick and Sandy GieseHello Dick and Sandy Giese has just sent you a greeting card from Bluemountaincom You can pick up your personal message here cardsboxaiiwtuvsjrhtml Your card will be available for the next days This service is FREE Have a good day and have fun Accessing your card indicates agreement with Blue Mountains Website Rules homeWebsiteRuleshtml Send FREE Blue Mountain cards to friends and family and attach gifts too
